statement: Find the area of the minimum square in the plane, such that its 4 vertices are distinct lattice points and there are exactly n lattice points strictly inside it. If there is no such square, return 0 instead.

notes.val: A lattice point in the coordinate plane is a point whose x-coordinate and y-coordinate are both integers.

examples.note: The square below contains exactly 4 lattice points strictly inside itself and has an area of 5.

constraints.val: n will be between 0 and 1,000,000,000,000, inclusive.
